OUR
HISTORY

Louis Matzo is an American company dedicated to the real estate and construction industry, with the explicit purpose of developing solid, strong, and safe buildings with the guarantee to meet all needs.

The real estate and construction industry is under the pressure of change on many fronts, especially in urbanization. Everything constantly changes the game's rules for investment cycles and capital market movements.

We like to be involved in projects from concept planning to execution. For us, it's not just a project; it's part of Louis Matzo.

HOW CAN WE
HELP YOU ?

Planning

We plan each of our projects in detail step-by-step. It involves defining actions, ordering timelines, staffing the project, and determining materials and equipment.

Construction

One of our purposes is to achieve the best results, offering solutions and quality oriented to maximum customer satisfaction in all projects.

Innovation

We potentiate our clients by discovering new ideas. For us, innovation is more than thinking about new things. Innovation is DOING new things.

Real Estate

A real estate is a form of real property. Real property is the land and any structures affixed to it that stand factored into the property's value.

Interiors

Interiors are a powerful, essential part of our daily lives. Interior is a process, a space that defines what your family is like and how you want them to see your home.

Affordable housing

Housing choice responds to highly complex economic, social, and psychological drivers. We can advise you to make the best choice for you.
